definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
Animal Farm (1945), novel and famous satire on communist revolution by George Orwell 喬治·奧威爾|乔治·奥威尔[Qiao2 zhi4 · Ao4 wei1 er3]/also translated 動物農場|动物农场[Dong4 wu4 Nong2 chang3]

sentences.english: Beauty fit to ornament those ancient manors.
sentences.chinese: 适于装饰那些古老的庄园的美人。

sentences.english: You want to find your sister tonight, I advise you to look in the Boylan Estate.
sentences.chinese: 今晚你想要找你姐姐，我劝你到博伊兰庄园去找。

sentences.english: They entered the property and followed the internal road until the entryway of the house.
sentences.chinese: 她们进入了庄园，沿着主干道来到房子的入口通道。

sentences.english: I like big manor, likes to easy life, where the fresh air is relaxing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜好大庄园，那边的氛围新颖让人抓紧。

sentences.english: "How could you manage such a large vineyard?" asked Wine.
sentences.chinese: 你一个人怎么会将这么大的庄园管理的这么好？

sentences.english: Nor the logistics of having staff support a distributed PC estate.
sentences.chinese: 亦不后勤学有职员支持一个分布的个人计算机庄园。

sentences.english: I often visited The Gables when I was a boy.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候常去“山墙庄园”作客。

sentences.english: The only large place is Tadfield Manor.
sentences.chinese: 这附近最大型的建筑可能就是塔德菲尔德庄园了。

sentences.english: His name was Mr Frankland, and he lived about four miles to the south of the Hall.
sentences.chinese: 他是福兰克兰先生，住在庄园以南约四英里远的地方。

sentences.english: Last night I dreamt I went to Manderley again.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，我梦自己又回到了曼陀丽庄园。

sentences.english: Which is the mole of black manor forest password box key in?
sentences.chinese: 摩尔庄园黑森林密码箱钥匙在哪？

sentences.english: However, following world war II, this distinction was surpassed by Petrus.
sentences.chinese: 但这种优势在二战后被柏翠庄园超越。

sentences.english: The most interesting thing about Clos Fourtet was the vast underground wine cellars, among the finest in Bordeaux region.
sentences.chinese: 富达庄园拥有波尔多区最大的地下酒窖。

sentences.english: Newgrange has some of the finest megalithic art in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 新庄园拥有欧洲最好的一些巨石艺术。

sentences.english: She turned and went back towards her house, and I walked on to Baskerville Hall.
sentences.chinese: 她转身往回走往，我便继续向巴斯克维尔庄园走往。

sentences.english: What else can detain him at Norland?
sentences.chinese: 还有什么事情能把他耽搁在诺兰庄园呢？

definition: an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names
